output: html_notebook

importing data


```{r}
library(haven)


airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)

airline
```

cleaning

```{r}
library(dplyr)

airline2 <- airline %>%
 filter(YEAR >= 1952L & YEAR <= 1979L) %>%
 filter(Y >= 3.4 & Y <= 23.8) %>%
 filter(W >= 0.4 & 
 W <= 1.78) %>%
 filter(R >= 0.26 & R <= 0.59) %>%
 filter(L >= 2.2 & L <= 6.9) %>%
 filter(K >= 2.9 & 
 K <= 9.6)

```

Data viz

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(airline2) +
  aes(x = YEAR, y = Y) +
  geom_point(shape = "circle", size = 1.5, colour = "#112446") +
  theme_minimal()

```
